projects.title: PESU-CAFE
projects.description: A web application designed to provide information on the menu and product availability. Users would be able to pre-order meals or purchase meal plans online.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Static portfolio website to showcase my work and projects. Developed using NextJS, with a clean and professional design.

projects.title: Tru-Doc
projects.description: A website designed using ReactJS that collects the symptoms from the patient and the ML model trained using python returns the top 5 possible diseases.

projects.title: Quiz Contest
projects.description: A sports quiz contest nicely designed using Html,CSS and Vanilla JS for two sports that includes background audio and many inbuilt graphics as well.

projects.title: Airplane-Ticket Booking
projects.description: A python tkinter code where you can book your flight tickets, select seats and meals, including online web check-in and a final payment form.
